description: Hop is short for the Hop Orchestration Platform. Written completely in Java it aims to provide a wide range of data orchestration tools, including a visual development environment, servers, metadata analysis, auditing services and so on. As a platform, Hop also wants to be a reusable library so that it can be easily reused by other software.
mentor: Tom Barber, Julian Hyde, Maximilian Michels, Francois Papon, Kevin Ratnasekera
